full_text: The Company shall maintain minimum liquidity of $350 million at all times. However, the foregoing shall not be required if the Company's liquidity shall fall below $300M.
The Company shall not pay dividends in excess of $10 million per quarter. Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, no certificate is required if EBITDA is negative for two consecutive quarters.
Borrower will provide budgets to Lenders each January.
